metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14656 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A missing address check in the callers of the show_opcodes() in the Linux kernel allows an attacker to dump the kernel memory at an arbitrary kernel address into the dmesg log.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
